attributes.action: Relax prohibitive immigration laws and embrace the human right to family life!
attributes.additional_details: Over a period of nearly 3 years due to mistakes made by the Home Office and poorly conceived immigration laws this family has suffered huge expense, anxiety, stress, suffering, alienation and discrimination. I, a British citizen taxpayer, married for 5 years to a non EU national, with whom I have a British child, still face having my wife and child torn away from me and sent to a 3rd world country depriving us of our fundamental right to privacy and family life. UK laws need to embrace families.
attributes.background: Due to restrictive and prohibitive immigration laws, we and other genuine marriages have suffered unfair and inhumane treatment as a result. Unlike EU nationals, we British citizens are forced to fight for a fundamental right to have a family, we are persecuted as criminals and our privacy invaded.
